attributes.action: Treatment for cancer suffer Rebecca warren uk
attributes.additional_details: Rebecca warren is 31 and a mother of 3 little girls Rebecca has a rair spinal cancer and needs to raise funds for her to get treatment abroad a sum of £250000 has to be raised by family and friends.as there is nothing more this country can do or offer her to help her please sign and let us ask why there is no help and why there is no funding for this young women to get the treatment she so needs WE NEED TO MAKE A STAND THIS IS SO NOT RIGHT OR FAIR..
